ISSUE.TITLE: Disable the CDN by default
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For better adoption, the CDN usages needs to be disabled by default. It should be opt-in in the admin. And CDN sources should use the provider that has the most coverage, especially with coverage in China which has the most restrictions for now. https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/pull/7599 https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/issues/7721
